column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We went on a Satruday in June -- Hint -- go early.  We arrived around 9 am and were proptly seated.  When we left the line was aroung the block!  Def try one of the sizziling skillets!  The eggs
column2: hashbrowns and toppings are cooked excellently.  Service was prompt
column3: bright and cheery.  Pancakes were good.  Note that the fruit ones are served with a fruit sauce -- fruit isn't cooked in the batter.  But they were tasty!
